name: magic 3d snowflake ornament
notes:
need a clever, yet simple christmas idea for your home or a gift? this magic 3d snowflake ornament will not only look great on your tree, but will be a favorite with the kids and adults alike.

you can make them in a multitude of colors to match any tree, wreath or decorative theme. better still, they can be attached to make a 3d snowflake, that looks great hanging, but also makes a wonderful standing ornament on a desktop.

while blocking is essential for making symmetrical and even snowflakes, you don't need to struggle with it. 
the easiest way is to download my free pdf **snowflake blocking template:** https://crochetfrog.com/tools/snowflake-blocking-template/.

you can find the full free pattern for the magic 3d snowflake on the crochet frog blog right here: https://crochetfrog.com/patterns/3d-crochet-snowflake-ornament/ 
for crafters who prefer a portable, ad-free experience or would like some extra visual help, i have also created this premium pdf version.
